schema.title: Response List Jobs Api Jobs Get

post.description:
Create a new recruiting job.

Uses content-based duplicate detection: if a job with identical content already exists,
returns the existing job instead of creating a duplicate.

delete.description: Delete a job and all associated data.

post.description: Start the agent pipeline for a job.

Find more candidates for an existing job.
Re-runs the pipeline but excludes already-found candidates.

get.description: List candidates, optionally filtered by job_id.

schema.title: Response List Candidates Api Candidates Get

get.description: Get outreach message for a candidate.

post.description:
Generate outreach message for a candidate on-demand.
This triggers the Engager agent for just this specific candidate.
Create a new chat session for a candidate.

get.description: Get a chat session with its full message history.

delete.description: Delete a chat session and all its messages.

get.description: Get a candidate's chat session by UUID.

post.description:
Send a message to the chat session and get an AI response.

Implements the tool calling loop:
1. Loads conversation history
2. Builds system prompt with candidate context
3. Sends user message to LLM with available tools
4. Executes any tool calls (max 3 iterations)
5. Returns final AI response

delete.description: Clear all messages from a chat session but keep the session.
Clear all chat history for a candidate by UUID.

get.description:
Search candidates using semantic similarity across ALL jobs.

This endpoint searches the entire candidate pool globally, not filtered by job.
A candidate who applied for one position might be perfect for another based on
their strengths and skills.

Args:
    query: Natural language query describing desired candidate strengths (min 3 chars)
    limit: Maximum number of results (default 10, max 100)

Returns:
    List of candidates ranked by similarity across all jobs

Get all candidates for a job from Weaviate vector database.

Args:
    job_id: Job ID to filter by (required)
    min_fit_score: Minimum fit score threshold (optional)

Returns:
    List of candidates from vector database

post.description:
Conversational candidate search powered by Weaviate QueryAgent.

Expects a list of chat messages (role/content). The last user message should
contain the current question; prior messages provide context.
Analyze a GitHub repository using LLM.

get.description:
Get a snapshot of the candidate graph.
Returns nodes and links formatted for react-force-graph-2d.

Get the graph for a specific candidate by username or ID.
Returns nodes and links formatted for react-force-graph-2d.

delete.description: Delete a candidate node and its relationships.

get.description:
Get graph centered around a specific entity (Skill, Location, etc.).
Returns nodes and links formatted for react-force-graph-2d.
